item.title: Trump crying wolf over tariffs has already convinced Wall Street that threats will be short-lived

item.title: Merck’s soft guidance overshadows quarterly beat to send stock down 6%

item.title: Investors are growing anxious about Novo Nordisk’s silence since disappointing CagriSema weight loss drug results

item.title: Diageo shares under pressure as tariff uncertainty leads to no outlook
